section.title: units of measure creating new Unit of Measure
section.para: To create a new Unit of Measure, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

note.para: You will notice that Units of Measure may be overwritten in various places throughout the application--for example, on the Item master. This functionality is intentional. Units of Measure are intended to be editable.

section.para: When creating a new Unit of Measure, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique name for the Unit of Measure.
Enter a description to further identify the Unit of Measure.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Unit of Measure, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Unit of Measure and adds it to the master list of Units of Measure.
